SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
-- Calcula Periodo update aux_h_supra set id_periodo = cast(left(fecha_liquidacion_pago,6) as int)
-- Unifica en un solo evento el caso de pago de subsidio a más de un heredero select a0.SBS_NEV, suma into #temp_prorateo from as400.host03.desarrollo.sbs000 a0 inner join (select EVE_NRO, sum(SBF_IMP) suma from as400.host03.desarrollo.sbs003 group by EVE_NRO) T on a0.SBS_NEV = t.EVE_NRO
update aux_h_supra set imp_cod_pag = t.suma from aux_h_supra A inner join #temp_prorateo t on a.id_codigo_evento = t.SBS_NEV where id_subsidio_supra_suf = 2
update aux_h_supra set id_plan_producto = id_plan_producto collate Modern_Spanish_CI_AS

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
select id_prestacion,left(id_prestacion,2) as id_nomenclador, right(rtrim(id_prestacion),len(id_prestacion)-2) as de_codigo_prestacion ,cast ('' as varchar(50)) as de_prestacion,99 as id_capitulo, 99 as id_subcapitulo, 99 as id_seccion, 'N' as id_seguir_prestacion, 99 as id_grupo_prestacion, 99 as id_subgrupo_prestacion, 9999 as id_accion_farmacologica,99 as id_servicio_prest, 'S' as id_catalogada, 9 as id_cod_resolucion, 999 as id_nivel_capacitacion, 999 as id_complegidad, 0 as id_provision_prest, '' as id_subro_ind_consumo, 'N' as id_prestacion_oncologica, null as id_prestacion_homologada, 0 as id_marca_recupero_sur, 0 as simulador_convenio, 0 as evolucion_pareto, 0 as orden_parteo, null as id_grupo_prestaciones_irp into #temp_prest_nuevas from H_SUBSIDIO_SUPRA_SUf where id_prestacion not in (select id_prestacion from d_prestacion) group by id_prestacion
update #temp_prest_nuevas set de_prestacion = nmc_des collate Modern_Spanish_CI_AS from #temp_prest_nuevas h inner join as400.host03.desarrollo.QRG008 q8 on q8.nmc_cod collate Modern_Spanish_CI_AS = h.de_codigo_prestacion
insert into d_prestacion select *, null as id_requiere_informe from #temp_prest_nuevas

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection

properties.property: select a10.eve_co as id_codigo_evento, 1 as cod_subsidios , a10.EVE_SRC as id_producto, a10.eve_pla as id_plan_producto, ''as id_clase_producto, a10.eve_npe as id_persona, a10.eve_prc as id_acreedor, 'P' as id_tipo_prestador, a11.NMC_COD as id_prestacion, 0 as id_tipo_evento, '0' as id_estado_evento, 1 as cant_cod, 1 as cant_cod_pag, EVE_IMP as imp_cod_pag, a11.EVE_USR as usuario_carga, a11.EVE_REA as fecha_prestacion, a11.EVE_REC as fecha_recepcion, a10.EVE_FLI as fecha_liquidacion_pago, a10.eve_nch as numero_cheque, a10.EVE_impch as importe_cheque, '' as id_nomenclador from desarrollo.QRG010 a10 inner join desarrollo.QRG011 a11 on a10.eve_co = a11.eve_co where EVE_FLI >= ?

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource: -- Obtiene el nomenclador update aux_h_supra set id_nomenclador = NMC_TNO from aux_h_supra a11 inner join as400.host03.desarrollo.QRG008 q08 on q08.nmc_cod = a11.id_prestacion and id_subsidio_supra_suf = 1

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
delete from H_SUBSIDIO_SUPRA_SUF where id_periodo >= dbo.periodosanteriores(dbo.devuelveperiodo(getdate()),7)
-- Inserta de Auxiliar a Definitiva H insert into H_SUBSIDIO_SUPRA_SUF select id_periodo, id_codigo_evento, id_subsidio_supra_suf, isnull(id_producto,0), id_plan_producto, id_clase_producto, id_persona, ISNULL(id_acreedor,999999), id_tipo_prestador, id_tipo_evento_subsidio_suf, id_estado_evento_suf, cant_cod, imp_cod_pag, usuario_carga, case when fecha_prestacion <> '00000000' then cast(CAST(ISNULL(fecha_prestacion,'1900-01-01')AS VARCHAR) as datetime) else '1900-01-01' end,-- as fecha_prestacion case when fecha_recepcion <> '00000000' then cast(CAST(ISNULL(fecha_recepcion,'1900-01-01') AS VARCHAR) as datetime) else '1900-01-01' end,-- as fecha_recepcion case when fecha_liquidacion_pago <> '00000000' then cast(CAST(ISNULL(fecha_liquidacion_pago,'1900-01-01')AS VARCHAR) as datetime) else '1900-01-01' end,-- as fecha_liquidacion_pago, case when numero_cheque <> 0 then 0 else 1 end, -- id_forma_pago_subsidio, -- id_forma_pago_cursograma -- tinyint en H - D_FORMA_PAGO_CURSOGRAMA importe_cheque, id_nomenclador + cast(id_prestacion as varchar) from aux_h_supra
update H_SUBSIDIO_SUPRA_SUf set id_producto = case when l.id_subrubro_ley = 1 then 32 -- Gravado when l.id_SubRubro_ley = 2 then 15 -- No gravado end from H_SUBSIDIO_SUPRA_SUf s inner join H_COMER_STOCK_AFILIA h on h.id_persona = s.id_persona inner join d_planes d on h.id_producto = d.id_producto and h.id_plan_producto = d.id_plan_producto inner join D_SUBRUBRO_LEY l on d.id_SubRubro_ley = l.id_subrubro_ley where id_subsidio_supra_suf = 2
-- Setea la clase producto a travez del producto update H_SUBSIDIO_SUPRA_SUf set id_clase_producto = d.id_clase_producto from H_SUBSIDIO_SUPRA_SUf h inner join D_PRODUCTOS d on h.id_producto = d.id_producto
select h.* from H_SUBSIDIO_SUPRA_SUf s inner join H_COMER_STOCK_AFILIA h on h.id_persona = s.id_persona inner join d_planes d on h.id_producto = d.id_producto and h.id_plan_producto = d.id_plan_producto inner join D_SUBRUBRO_LEY l on d.id_SubRubro_ley = l.id_subrubro_ley where id_subsidio_supra_suf = 2
update h_subsidio_supra_suf set id_prestacion = 'XX0' where id_subsidio_supra_suf = 2
update h_subsidio_supra_suf set id_producto = 0 where id_producto is null
